mapper.insert: INSERT into user (userName, realName, sex, phone, address, birthday, registDate, email, identity) value (#{userName}, #{realName}, #{sex}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{birthday}, #{registDate}, #{email}, #{identity})
mapper.update: update user set username = #{username}, phone = #{phone}, address = #{address}, email = #{email}, identity = #{identity} where id = #{id}
